descriptor.name: Mega Science Kit | 6-10 Years
descriptor.short_desc: Get ready to spark your child's love for science with Smartivity Mega Science Kit! With a whopping 108 experiments, your little scientist will dive into the world of acids and bases, polymers, soap making and much more. Don't miss out on this explosive opportunity to collide the world of science with your child's curiosity.
descriptor.long_desc: Get ready to spark your child's love for science with Smartivity Mega Science Kit! With a whopping 108 experiments, your little scientist will dive into the world of acids and bases, polymers, soap making and much more. Don't miss out on this explosive opportunity to collide the world of science with your child's curiosity.

descriptor.short_desc: A number is a mathematical object used to count, measure, and label. The original examples are the natural numbers 1, 2, 3, 4, and so forth. Numbers can be represented in language with number words.

descriptor.name: Pure Neem Wood Comb test product leaf comb green wood test 101
descriptor.short_desc:
Moraze Pure Neem Wood Comb in Brown. This high-quality comb is crafted from pure neem wood, known for its exceptional properties and benefits for hair and scalp.

The neem wood used in this comb is carefully selected and sourced to ensure its premium quality. Neem wood is known for its natural regenerative properties, making it an excellent choice for promoting healthy hair and scalp.

descriptor.name: Super Light Gel with Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin 49-g
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Detail

Looking for 24 hours of moisturization for your skin? Look no further! Introducing the all new Pond’s Super Light Gel - your go-to moisturizer for all seasons. Infused with the goodness of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E and Glycerine, this super light moisturizer absorbs faster than regular creams and gives 24-hour hydration for a water-fresh glow! It helps restore the moisture balance to keep your skin soft and smooth. Its lightweight formula absorbs into the skin instantly without leaving any sticky feeling, making it ideal for all seasons, even in scorching summers.
descriptor.long_desc:
Product Detail

It helps restore the moisture balance to keep your skin soft and smooth. Its lightweight formula absorbs into the skin instantly without leaving any sticky feeling, making it ideal for all seasons, even in scorching summers.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Super Light Gel with Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin 49-g

descriptor.name: chia seeds test product Chia Seeds - 100g
descriptor.short_desc:
About this item
CALCIUM RICH: These seeds can help strengthen your bones and muscles.
HEART HEALTH: Omega Fats are the healthy fats that your body requires for reducing the cholesterol levels and protecting the heart health.
DIET SNACKS: Fibre (38g per 100g) not only helps in weight management, but fibre rich chia seeds can also be helpful in improving digestion.
IMMUNITY BOOSTER: Daily consumption of 1 teaspoon chia seeds mixed with water can help in boosting your immunity.
LOW CALORIES: Chia seeds for eating are low in calories and cholesterol which can help in preventing sugar spikes.
CONTAINS PREBIOTICS: Chia seeds is high in fibre which acts like a prebiotic, that promotes the growth of good bacteria, thus can help improving the gut health.
